definition: one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell

sentences.english: Few drinks at the dinner will find us all snoozed at the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯來幾杯，過會紛紛睡倒在沙發上了。

sentences.english: Passersby, one by one, threw paper money and coins into the small bucket beside his feet.
sentences.chinese: 過路人紛紛向他腳下的一個小鐵桶裏扔着紙幣和硬幣。

sentences.english: People stampeded from the burning cinema.
sentences.chinese: 人們從着了火的電影院裏紛紛逃出。

sentences.english: They all clamoured to take the floor.
Telegrams expressing sympathy poured in from all parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全國各地紛紛打來了慰問電。

sentences.english: The songs on this album became popular hits and were broadcast on television and radio station throughout Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 專輯歌曲如此暢銷，阿富汗全國電視電臺紛紛播送。

sentences.english: Be broken by wind or have?
Then the client opens data center in succession, look after all.
sentences.chinese: 於是客戶紛紛來到亦莊網通數據中心，一看究竟。

sentences.english: The birds exploded into the air, all pipes and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鳥羣猛衝上天，鳴叫響成一片，羽毛紛紛飄落。

sentences.english: Seeing the mountain scenery from the city gate tower, I suddenly heard a hubbub in the city.
sentences.chinese: 我正在城樓上觀山景，忽然聽見城下亂紛紛。

sentences.english: What's more, many European governments are entering their languid summer hiatus.
sentences.chinese: 此外，許多歐洲國家的政府正紛紛進入夏季怠政期。

sentences.english: Snow there were numerous underground night.
sentences.chinese: 雪紛紛揚揚地下了一夜。

sentences.english: Nearby the man takes out cellular phone to pull out to beat in succession.
sentences.chinese: 身邊男人紛紛拿出手機拔打起來。

sentences.english: A stone arouses thousand layer wave, the parents also have to follow the.
sentences.chinese: 一石激起千層浪，身邊的家長也紛紛跟着應和。

sentences.english: City wall top and bottom discusses in succession, coax noisy voice in, that white fog is pile up near.
sentences.chinese: 城牆上下議論紛紛，哄吵聲中，那片白霧越來越近。

sentences.english: But then the crowd began cheering and putting flowers into the gun barrels of the tanks.
sentences.chinese: 但是，很快人羣開始歡呼，紛紛把花插在炮筒裏。
